data.message: Hi Debbie, each year, we try to cover as much of the country as we can but unfortunately, we can't visit every single town and city. To ensure that as many people as possible get the opportunity to experience the tour we update the route every year to add new locations.

replies.message: Hi Debbie   .. it's coming to a town near me 😁 ill take some photos 👌✔
It goes to London every year more then once I know it's the capital but what about other places? I know of a few places it's never been
How on earth will people know the holidays are coming without your lorry rolling in to town?

Hi everyone! :P 

No worries Coca Cola. I know you guys are doing your best! 

Thanks for the reply :)
